name: Fire: a game about magic fire and demon ghost thingies of darkness
name_original: Fire: a game about magic fire and demon ghost thingies of darkness
description:
Fire: a game about magic fire and demon ghost thingies of darkness is an adventure game developed by RustyCricket. It was originally released in 2017.
You can play Fire: a game about magic fire and demon ghost thingies of darkness on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
